channel.title: RuneScape private Server Website. - Release V1
channel.description:
I am releasing my website i have made using PHP
To use this websitye you will need a webserver capable of hosting PHP and using Mysql databases
Make a database called serverwebsite Here is the SQL code you will need to put in it [code=sql]CREATE TABLE `serverwebsite`.`Password` ( `Type` TEXT NOT NULL , `Username` TEXT NOT NULL , `Password` TEXT NOT NULL , `Summary` TEXT NOT NULL , `Level` INT NOT NULL , `Staff` TEXT NOT NULL , `Email` TEXT NOT NULL CREATE TABLE `serverwebsite`.`Appeals` ( `Type` TEXT NOT NULL , `Username` TEXT NOT NULL , `Summary` TEXT NOT NULL CREATE TABLE `serverwebsite`.`Staffapps` ( `Username` TEXT NOT NULL , `Since` TEXT NOT NULL , `Summary` TEXT NOT NULL , `Email` TEXT NOT NULL ) ENGINE = MYISAM ; [/code]
Pictures [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/fwinfm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/35n7rer.png[/img]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2rr5m60.png[/img]
[b]Do not post if you are a noob and it wont work when you open.. I have already told you that you need a webserver to use it so shhhh[/b]

item.title: RuneScape private Server Website. - Release V1
item.dc:creator: @Master_Bob Master Bob
item.description:
@Master_Bob wrote:

Well, I’m gonna be nooby and post my error.

[code]SQL query:

CREATE TABLE a2407737_website.Password (
Type TEXT NOT NULL ,
Username TEXT NOT NULL ,
Password TEXT NOT NULL ,
Summary TEXT NOT NULL ,
Level INT NOT NULL ,
Staff TEXT NOT NULL ,
Email TEXT NOT NULL CREATE TABLE a2407737_website.Appeals (
Type TEXT NOT NULL ,
Username TEXT NOT NULL ,
Summary TEXT NOT NULL CREATE TABLE a2407737_website.Staffapps (
Username TEXT NOT NULL ,
Since TEXT NOT NULL ,
Summary TEXT NOT NULL ,
Email TEXT NOT NULL
) ENGINE = MYISAM

MySQL said: Documentation
#1064 - You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'CREATE TABLE a2407737_website.Appeals (
Type TEXT NOT NULL ,
Username’ at line 9[/code]
Can I get some help? Also, nice site, keep up with the good work!

Read full topic

#1064 - You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ‘CREATE TABLE serverwebsite.Appeals ( Type TEXT NOT NULL , Username TE’ at line 9

what are the values or length or the tables? i am building the database by hand.

does this work with all servers from 508 and lower and higher? i guess chmod to 777? if you want me to i will post a link to show it works.

team boy:

i have 1 question becuse when i cklik on somting it says http://localhost/account/password.php so … where i need change the ip to my ip?

Open all the files and then do ctrl+H then type localhost and then type your ip then click replace all, do that in every file
